OpenNN::PerformanceFunctional::FirstOrderEvaluation

#include <performance_functional.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

double performance
Vector< double > gradient

Detailed Description

Set of evaluation value and gradient vector of the peformance function. A method returning this structure might be implemented more efficiently than the performance and gradient methods separately.
